attribute.value: Layer group 'Web' may not access Layer group 'Weather' - the dependency is forbidden because there are no allowing definitions

attribute.name: Explanation
attribute.value: Layer group 'Web' may not access Layer group 'Weather' - the dependency is forbidden because there are no allowing definitions

warningsByAttribute.attributeDescription: Total number of byte code instructions of a class file aggregated for the measured element.
Total number of lines of code in the measured element. Counts every line that is not a blank or comment line, regardless of the number of statements.
Total number of statements contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of internal types (all)
metric.description: Total number of internal types contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of excluded internal types
metric.description: Total number of excluded (internal) types contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of unassigned types
metric.description: Total number of types that are not assigned to any logical element defined in the architecture model.

metric.name: Lines of code
metric.description: Total number of lines of code in the measured element. Counts every line that is not a blank or comment line, regardless of the number of statements.

metric.name: Number of type dependencies (remote)
metric.description: Total number of type dependencies (in and out) between the set of types contained in the measured element and the set of types not contained in the measured element; including dependencies to external types.

metric.name: Number of type dependencies (local)
metric.description: Total number of type dependencies (in and out) between all types which are contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of using elements
metric.description: Total number of elements of the same type which are using the measured element (files using files, packages using packages, ...).

metric.name: Number of used elements
metric.description: Total number of elements of the same type which are used by the measured element (files using files, packages using packages, ...).

metric.name: Relational cohesion (RC)
metric.description: Total number of internal type relations divided by the total number of types within the measured element.

metric.name: I (Instability)
metric.description: I = Ce/(Ca+Ce) - The metric has a range of [0,1]. If there are no outgoing dependencies, then I will be 0 and the measured element is stable. If there are no incoming dependencies, then I will be 1 and the measured element is instable. Stable means that the element is not so easy to be changed. Instable means that it is easier to be changed.

metric.name: Ce (Efferent coupling)
metric.description: Total number of types inside of the measured element that depend upon types outside the measured element via outgoing dependencies.

metric.name: Ca (Afferent coupling)
metric.description: Total number of types outside of the measured element that depend upon types inside the measured element via incoming dependencies.

metric.name: Number of internal types (abstract)
metric.description: Total number of internal types contained in the measured element that are abstract or interface types.

metric.name: Number of internal types (w/ implementation)
metric.description: Total number of internal types contained in the measured element that contain at least one implemented method.

metric.name: A (Abstractness)
metric.description: Total number of abstract types divided by the total number of concrete types in the measured element - The metric has a range of [0,1]. 0 means that the container contains no abstract types. 1 means that the container contains nothing but abstract types.

metric.name: D (Distance)
metric.description: D = A + I - 1 - The metric has a range of [-1,1]. A good value should be around 0.

metric.name: Number of methods (all)
metric.description: Total number of all methods contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of methods (w/ implementation)
metric.description: Total number of methods with implementation contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of methods (abstract)
metric.description: Total number of abstract methods contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (accumulated)
metric.description: cyclomatic complexity - accumulated for all methods in the measured element.

metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (max per method)
metric.description: Maximal cyclomatic complexity per method in the measured element.

metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (max accumulated per type)
metric.description: Maximal accumulated cyclomatic complexity per type in the measured element.

metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (average per method)
metric.description: Average cyclomatic complexity per method - calculated for all methods in the measured element.

metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (average accumulated per type)
metric.description: Average accumulated cyclomatic complexity per type - calculated for all types in the measured element.

metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (accumulated)
metric.description: Extended cyclomatic complexity - accumulated for all methods in the measured element.

metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (max per method)
metric.description: Maximal extended cyclomatic complexity per method in the measured element.

metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (max accumulated per type)
metric.description: Maximal accumulated extended cyclomatic complexity per type in the measured element.

metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (average per method)
metric.description: Average extended cyclomatic complexity per method - calculated for all methods in the measured element.

metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (average accumulated per type)
metric.description: Average accumulated extended cyclomatic complexity per type - calculated for all types in the measured element.

metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (accumulated)
metric.description: Modified cyclomatic complexity - accumulated for all methods in the measured element.

metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (max per method)
metric.description: Maximal modified cyclomatic complexity per method in the measured element.

metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (max accumulated per type)
metric.description: Maximal accumulated modified cyclomatic complexity per type in the measured element.

metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (average per method)
metric.description: Average modified cyclomatic complexity per method - calculated for all methods in the measured element.

metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (average accumulated per type)
metric.description: Average accumulated modified cyclomatic complexity per type - calculated for all types in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of public types
metric.description: Number of types accessible from outside of the measured element, i.e. all public types.

metric.name: Number of duplicate code blocks
metric.description: Number of duplicate code blocks detected in source files associated with types that are located in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of assertions
metric.description: Total number of assertions of the measured element.

metric.name: Number of statements
metric.description: Total number of statements contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of instructions
metric.description: Total number of byte code instructions of a class file aggregated for the measured element.

metric.name: Number of build units
metric.description: Total number of build units aggregated for the measured element.

metric.name: Depends upon
metric.description: Total number of project internal elements that the measured element directly and indirectly depends upon.

metric.name: Average type dependency
metric.description: Average number of types a type depends on directly and indirectly. This metric can be used to characterize the overall average coupling of project internal types.

metric.name: Relative average type dependency
metric.description: Average type dependency divided by the number of project internal types multiplied by 100 (in percent).

metric.name: Normalized cumulative type dependency
metric.description: The ratio between the cumulative type dependency of a project and the cumulative type dependency of a balanced binary tree of the same size. A value greater than 1 indicates a more vertical design. A value less than 1 indicates a more horizontal design.

metric.name: Average component dependency (ACD)
metric.description: Average number of components (source files) a component (source file) depends on directly and indirectly. This metric can be used to characterize the overall average coupling of project internal components (source files).

metric.name: Relative average component dependency
metric.description: Average component dependency divided by the number of project internal source files multiplied by 100 (in percent).

metric.name: Normalized cumulative component dependency (NCCD)
metric.description: The ratio between the cumulative component dependency of a project and the cumulative component dependency of a balanced binary tree of the same size. A value greater than 1 indicates a more vertical design. A value less than 1 indicates a more horizontal design.

metric.name: Number of violating references
metric.description: Total number of type references that start from types in the measured element and violate architectural restrictions.

metric.name: Number of violating types
metric.description: Total number of types with a dependency violation according to the systems architecture model.

metric.name: Number of type dependencies (all)
metric.description: Total number of all type dependencies (in and out) of types contained in the measured element; including dependencies to external types.

metric.name: Number of violating type dependencies
metric.description: Total number of type dependencies that start from types in the measured element and violate architectural restrictions. Ignored violations are not counted.

metric.name: Number of tasks
metric.description: Total number of tasks defined in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of warnings (all)
metric.description: Total number of warnings which are related to the measured element. All kinds of warnings are counted.

metric.name: Number of cyclic elements
metric.description: Total number of cyclic coupled elements of any kind contained in a system.

metric.name: Number of warnings (thresholds)
metric.description: Total number of threshold warnings which are related to the measured element.

metric.name: Number of warnings (duplicate code blocks)
metric.description: Total number of duplicate code block warnings which are related to the measured element.

metric.name: Number of warnings (cyclic)
metric.description: Total number of cycle group warnings which are related to the measured element.

metric.name: Number of warnings (workspace)
metric.description: Total number of workspace warnings which are related to the measured element.

metric.name: Number of ignored violations
metric.description: Total number of violations which are related to the measured element and filtered out by a violation filter.

metric.name: Number of ignored warnings
metric.description: Total number of warnings which are related to the measured element and filtered out by an ignore warning filter.

metric.name: Number of fix warning tasks
metric.description: Total number of warnings which are related to the measured element and have been converted to fix warning tasks.

metric.name: Number of refactoring tasks
metric.description: Total number of refactoring tasks defined in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of layer groups
metric.description: Total number of layer groups defined in a projects architecture model.

metric.name: Number of cyclic layer groups
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled layer groups contained in a project.

metric.name: Number of vertical slice groups
metric.description: Total number of vertical slice groups defined in a projects architecture model.

metric.name: Number of cyclic vertical slice groups
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled vertical slice groups contained in a project.

metric.name: Number of layers
metric.description: Total number of layers defined in a projects architecture model.

metric.name: Number of cyclic layers
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled layers contained within the direct architectural parent in a project.

metric.name: Number of vertical slices
metric.description: Total number of vertical slices defined in a projects architecture model.

metric.name: Number of cyclic vertical slices
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled vertical slices contained within the direct architectural parent in a project.

metric.name: Number of subsystems
metric.description: Total number of subsystems defined in a projects architecture model.

metric.name: Number of cyclic subsystems
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled subsystems contained within the direct architectural parent in a project.

metric.name: Number of named interfaces
metric.description: Total number of named interfaces defined in a projects architecture model.

metric.name: Number of internal packages
metric.description: Total number of internal packages contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of cyclic packages
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled packages contained in a project.

metric.name: Structural erosion - type level
metric.description: Number of type dependencies that must be cut in order to remove all package cycles in a project (this is not always the exact minimum number, but a heuristic-based guess).

metric.name: Structural erosion - reference level
metric.description: Number of code references that must be removed in order to remove all package cycles in a project (this is not always the exact minimum number, but a heuristic-based guess).

metric.name: Structural debt (index)
metric.description:
This metric computes a number that should be roughly proportional to the effort needed to clean up all structural erosion in your system. It is computed on the project level and then aggregated to the system level. Basically the following major components go into the computation of the metric:
- The number of type dependencies that would need to be cut to break all cyclic package dependencies: 10 metric points per type dependency and 1 additional point per occurrence of the dependency in the code - Architecture violations: Again 10 metric points per forbidden type dependency and 1 point per occurrence in the code. - Refactoring tasks: 1 point for each move, delete and rename refactoring task, 10 points per cut dependency refactoring task. For delete and cut refactoring tasks 1 additional point per occurrence in the code. - Metric threshold violations: Each threshold violation adds 10 metric points - Fix threshold violation task: Each task associated with fixing a threshold violation also adds 10 metric points
Although this metric is certainly not perfect it is a good indicator for the level of structural erosion in a project. The higher the value the more effort will be needed to clean up the project. You will also see that the metric will grow in times of high pressure and that it will shrink when you invest time into improving the structure of the code.

metric.name: Structural debt (cost)
metric.description:
This metric tries to estimate the cost associated with cleaning up the structural debt. It is only computed when you configure an amount per point of structural debt index. As a starting point we estimate that under optimal circumstances 1 point should equal between 6 and 10 minutes of programmer time. You can assume that this time span grows with team size. If you know the cost per programmer hour you can configure the amount per metric point easily.
For example if your programmer hour costs $60.00 and you assume 10 minutes per point, 1 metric point equals $10.00.

metric.name: Average assertion usage
metric.description: Average number of assertions per type in an element. Only such types are considered that define at least one non-abstract and non-native method.

metric.name: Level
metric.description: Level of the measured element in the projects dependency hierarchy. See the User Manual for the definition of level.

metric.name: Number of Java source files (all)
metric.description: Total number of Java source files contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of cyclic source files
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled source files contained within package boundaries of a project.

metric.name: Number of cyclic directories
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled directories contained within path container boundaries in a project.

metric.name: Number of cyclic build units
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled build units contained within a project.

metric.name: Number of Java target files (all)
metric.description: Total number of Java class files contained in the measured element.

metric.name: Number of Java source files (non-excluded)
metric.description: Total number of Java source files contained in the measured element; all files are counted which contain at least one non-excluded type.

metric.name: Number of Java target files (non-excluded)
metric.description: Total number of Java class files contained in the measured element; all files are counted which contain at least one non-excluded type.
